jedi:archwizardhat.NAME: Archwizard's Hat

jedi:ashlotus.NAME: Ash Lotus

jedi:battlestandard.NAME: Battle Standard
jedi:battlestandard.FLAVOR: To battle! Fight! Fight for your life!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You have to enter combat rooms whenever you can.

jedi:crownofsimplicity.NAME: Crown of Simplicity
jedi:crownofsimplicity.FLAVOR: An extremely simple crown for an extremely simple purpose.
DESCRIPTIONS: First #yBasic card each turn is played twice.

jedi:cryingmask.NAME: Crying Mask
jedi:cryingmask.FLAVOR: Mask worn by the Merchant of the past... Or is it of the future?

jedi:endoplasm.NAME: Endoplasm
jedi:endoplasm.FLAVOR: Yes it does work in non-combat rooms. No it's not a bug. No you don't lose gold in blood shop.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. The first time you lose HP each round, lose #r50 #yGold. Whenever you lose HP outside of combat, lose #r50 #yGold.

jedi:fakemustache.NAME: Fake Mustache
DESCRIPTIONS: When spending #yGold at the shop, heal #b5 HP. Heal #b10 HP upon pickup.

jedi:firstaidkit.NAME: First Aid Kit
jedi:firstaidkit.FLAVOR: Do you really need a bandage for every byrd peck?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, gain #b2 Regen.

jedi:gremlinknob.NAME: Gremlin Knob
jedi:gremlinknob.FLAVOR: If I hear ONE MORE knock-knock joke...

jedi:heavyjacket.NAME: Heavy Jacket
jedi:heavyjacket.FLAVOR: That's a lot of pockets for a single jacket.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yPlated #yArmor for every #b2 relics you have.

jedi:hotpepper.NAME: Hot Pepper
jedi:hotpepper.FLAVOR: Not only it burns your mouth when you eat it, it also leaves a horrible aftertaste so that any food after it doesn't taste well.

jedi:kaleidoscope.NAME: Kaleidoscope
jedi:kaleidoscope.FLAVOR: It seems to be lacking its main shard...
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #yStrength equal to unique card colors in your deck.

jedi:laserpointer.NAME: Laser Pointer
jedi:laserpointer.FLAVOR: Why is it a pointer if it targets everyone?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b1 #yLock-On to ALL enemies.

jedi:leadlinedbottle.NAME: Lead-Lined Bottle
